description.highlights: The display of the heritage of the United States in various areas including the original Star-Spangled Banner
description.keywords: National Museum of American History, heritage, United States, Smithsonian Institution, National Mall, Star-Spangled Banner, Washington D.C., visitors, military history, political, cultural, scientific

birdview.highlights: The building features a classic design with a prominent central section flanked by symmetrical wings. The central section has a grand entrance with a series of large columns supporting a pediment.
birdview.shape: The architecture uses a rectangular shape that provides a symmetrical and balanced form, invoking a sense of order and stability.
birdview.spatial design: Its classical symmetry and grandiose entry suggest power and importance within its urban setting.
birdview.material design: The use of light-colored stone materials exudes an air of formality, durability, and prestige, and the large windows suggest transparency and openness.
birdview.keywords: symmetry, classical, columns, pediment, rectangular, balanced, grand, urban setting, light-colored stone, formality

facade.highlights: The building has a strong linear aesthetic with a row of large, vertical concrete columns or pilasters creating rhythm and a stately, formal appearance. There is also notable integration of green landscaping that complements the architecture.
facade.shape: This building has a boxy, rectangular form that is common in modernist architecture. The vertical elements dominate the facade, giving it a sense of order and symmetry.
facade.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form lies in the repetitiveness of its structural vertical columns and the clear, strong lines that give the building a minimalist yet pronounced stature.
facade.material design: This design features raw concrete as the main material for the facade, celebrated for its simplicity and unadorned finish (a characteristic of Brutalist architecture), which contrasts with the soft and colorful landscaping around it.
facade.keywords: modernist, Brutalist, concrete, vertical columns, symmetry, minimalism, landscaping, rhythm, rectangular form

interior.highlights: The highlight of this design is the integration of a historical wooden structure within a modern interior space, creating a contrast between old and new elements.
interior.shape: The historical structure has a simple, rectangular prism form, while the modern interior space features clean lines and geometric shapes.
interior.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form is the juxtaposition of the rustic, textured wooden cabin against the sleek, refined surfaces of the museum's contemporary architecture.
interior.material design: The highlight in its spatial and material design is the preservation of the old wooden cabin's authentic materials and textures within the modern building, providing a tangible connection to history.
interior.keywords: historical, wooden structure, modern, interior, contrast, juxtaposition, rustic, textured, preservation, authenticity, history

interior2.highlights: The highlight of this design is the centrally placed statue with an inspirational message 'WE BUILD TOGETHER' on the wall behind it, portraying a sense of unity and collective effort.
interior2.shape: The form used is a combination of circular and rectangular design elements, with a circular overhead structure that seems to spotlight the statue, and rectangular wall panels surrounding the space.
interior2.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form is the open space that directs focus towards the central statue, encouraging the visitors to gather around it, symbolizing a shared experience.
interior2.material design: The highlight in its spatial and material design is the contrast between the polished floor, the matte walls with text, and the weathered texture of the sculpture's pedestal, reflecting a blend of modernity and history.
interior2.keywords: central statue, unity, circular spotlight, open space, contrast, polished floors, textural walls, modernity, history, collective effort
